mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATCHING (mat_code, mat_name, mat_date, mat_time, mat_cancle, club_code) VALUES(seq_matching.nextval, #{match.mat_name}, #{match.mat_date}, #{match.mat_time}, 'N', #{club.club_code})
INSERT INTO MATCHINGINFO (matinfo_code, mat_code, club_code, matinfo_join) VALUES(seq_matchinginfo.nextval, ${match.mat_code}, ${club.club_code}, 'Y')
INSERT INTO MATCHINGINFO (matinfo_code, mat_code, club_code, matinfo_join) VALUES(seq_matchinginfo.nextval, ${match.mat_code}, (SELECT club_code FROM MEMCLUB WHERE MC_CODE = 1), 'N')
